name: InspiredVoice
0:
”Alexa, ask inspired voice for a starting point”
”Alexa, ask inspired voice to expand upon geology”
”Alexa, ask inspired voice to muse with the author William Wordsworth”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspired voice
des:
Ask inspired voice to share an inspiration with you. Need a starting point? Just ask. Updated daily. You can ask inspired voice to expand upon a genre. Or, ask inspired voice to imagine a famous literary figure as a muse.

To expand upon a genre, just say 'Alexa, ask inspired voice to expand upon geology' or 'Alexa, ask inspired voice to expand upon philosophy.'

To imagine an author as a muse, just say 'Alexa, ask inspired voice to muse with the author William Wordsworth' or 'Alexa, ask inspired voice to muse with the author Agatha Christie.'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
